entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as thinking hard and coming up with a plan to give back the diary to Mr. Malfoy.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is being tortured by Lucius Malfoy. Harry can hear Dobby's squeals of pain as he runs down the corridor.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is calm and advises Harry to hurry.

entities.name: mr malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is being given the diary by Harry. He is described as ripping off the sock and throwing it aside.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Mr. Malfoy's father, who is torturing Dobby. Harry gives the diary to Lucius Malfoy by forcing a smelly sock into his hand.

relationships.description: Harry asks Professor Dumbledore for permission to give the diary back to Mr. Malfoy.
Harry gives the diary to Mr. Malfoy by forcing a smelly sock into his hand.
Harry gives the diary to Lucius Malfoy by forcing a smelly sock into his hand.
Dobby is being tortured by Lucius Malfoy.
